problem_names:
lemma aval_eq_if_eq_on_vars[simp]:
  "s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars a \<Longrightarrow> aval a s\<^sub>1 = aval a s\<^sub>2"

lemma bval_eq_if_eq_on_vars:
  "s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b \<Longrightarrow> bval b s\<^sub>1 = bval b s\<^sub>2"

lemma vars_com_simps[simp]:
  "vars SKIP = {}"
  "vars (x::=e) = {x} \<union> vars e"
  "vars (c1;;c2) = vars c1 \<union> vars c2"
  "vars (IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2) = vars b \<union> vars c1 \<union> vars c2"
  "vars (WHILE b DO c) = vars b \<union> vars c"
translations:
lemma aval_eq_if_eq_on_vars[simp]:
  "s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars a \<Longrightarrow> aval a s\<^sub>1 = aval a s\<^sub>2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars a \<Longrightarrow>
    aval a s\<^sub>1 = aval a s\<^sub>2
apply(induction a)

proof (prove)
goal (5 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (N x) \<Longrightarrow>
       aval (N x) s\<^sub>1 = aval (N x) s\<^sub>2
 2. \<And>x.
       s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (V x) \<Longrightarrow>
       aval (V x) s\<^sub>1 = aval (V x) s\<^sub>2
 3. \<And>a1 a2.
       \<lbrakk>s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars a1 \<Longrightarrow>
                aval a1 s\<^sub>1 = aval a1 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars a2 \<Longrightarrow>
        aval a2 s\<^sub>1 = aval a2 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (Plus a1 a2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> aval (Plus a1 a2) s\<^sub>1 =
                         aval (Plus a1 a2) s\<^sub>2
 4. \<And>a1 a2.
       \<lbrakk>s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars a1 \<Longrightarrow>
                aval a1 s\<^sub>1 = aval a1 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars a2 \<Longrightarrow>
        aval a2 s\<^sub>1 = aval a2 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (Times a1 a2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> aval (Times a1 a2) s\<^sub>1 =
                         aval (Times a1 a2) s\<^sub>2
 5. \<And>a1 a2.
       \<lbrakk>s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars a1 \<Longrightarrow>
                aval a1 s\<^sub>1 = aval a1 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars a2 \<Longrightarrow>
        aval a2 s\<^sub>1 = aval a2 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (Div a1 a2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> aval (Div a1 a2) s\<^sub>1 =
                         aval (Div a1 a2) s\<^sub>2
apply simp_all

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

lemma bval_eq_if_eq_on_vars:
  "s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b \<Longrightarrow> bval b s\<^sub>1 = bval b s\<^sub>2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b \<Longrightarrow>
    bval b s\<^sub>1 = bval b s\<^sub>2
proof(induction b)

proof (state)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (Bc x) \<Longrightarrow>
       bval (Bc x) s\<^sub>1 = bval (Bc x) s\<^sub>2
 2. \<And>b.
       \<lbrakk>s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b \<Longrightarrow>
                bval b s\<^sub>1 = bval b s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (bexp.Not b)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> bval (bexp.Not b) s\<^sub>1 =
                         bval (bexp.Not b) s\<^sub>2
 3. \<And>b1 b2.
       \<lbrakk>s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b1 \<Longrightarrow>
                bval b1 s\<^sub>1 = bval b1 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b2 \<Longrightarrow>
        bval b2 s\<^sub>1 = bval b2 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (And b1 b2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> bval (And b1 b2) s\<^sub>1 =
                         bval (And b1 b2) s\<^sub>2
 4. \<And>x1a x2a.
       s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (Less x1a x2a) \<Longrightarrow>
       bval (Less x1a x2a) s\<^sub>1 = bval (Less x1a x2a) s\<^sub>2
case (Less a1 a2)

proof (state)
this:
  s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (Less a1 a2)

goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (Bc x) \<Longrightarrow>
       bval (Bc x) s\<^sub>1 = bval (Bc x) s\<^sub>2
 2. \<And>b.
       \<lbrakk>s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b \<Longrightarrow>
                bval b s\<^sub>1 = bval b s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (bexp.Not b)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> bval (bexp.Not b) s\<^sub>1 =
                         bval (bexp.Not b) s\<^sub>2
 3. \<And>b1 b2.
       \<lbrakk>s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b1 \<Longrightarrow>
                bval b1 s\<^sub>1 = bval b1 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b2 \<Longrightarrow>
        bval b2 s\<^sub>1 = bval b2 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (And b1 b2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> bval (And b1 b2) s\<^sub>1 =
                         bval (And b1 b2) s\<^sub>2
 4. \<And>x1a x2a.
       s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (Less x1a x2a) \<Longrightarrow>
       bval (Less x1a x2a) s\<^sub>1 = bval (Less x1a x2a) s\<^sub>2
hence "aval a1 s\<^sub>1 = aval a1 s\<^sub>2" and "aval a2 s\<^sub>1 = aval a2 s\<^sub>2"

proof (prove)
using this:
  s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (Less a1 a2)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. aval a1 s\<^sub>1 = aval a1 s\<^sub>2 &&&
    aval a2 s\<^sub>1 = aval a2 s\<^sub>2
by simp_all

proof (state)
this:
  aval a1 s\<^sub>1 = aval a1 s\<^sub>2
  aval a2 s\<^sub>1 = aval a2 s\<^sub>2

goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (Bc x) \<Longrightarrow>
       bval (Bc x) s\<^sub>1 = bval (Bc x) s\<^sub>2
 2. \<And>b.
       \<lbrakk>s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b \<Longrightarrow>
                bval b s\<^sub>1 = bval b s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (bexp.Not b)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> bval (bexp.Not b) s\<^sub>1 =
                         bval (bexp.Not b) s\<^sub>2
 3. \<And>b1 b2.
       \<lbrakk>s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b1 \<Longrightarrow>
                bval b1 s\<^sub>1 = bval b1 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b2 \<Longrightarrow>
        bval b2 s\<^sub>1 = bval b2 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (And b1 b2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> bval (And b1 b2) s\<^sub>1 =
                         bval (And b1 b2) s\<^sub>2
 4. \<And>x1a x2a.
       s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (Less x1a x2a) \<Longrightarrow>
       bval (Less x1a x2a) s\<^sub>1 = bval (Less x1a x2a) s\<^sub>2
thus ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  aval a1 s\<^sub>1 = aval a1 s\<^sub>2
  aval a2 s\<^sub>1 = aval a2 s\<^sub>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bval (Less a1 a2) s\<^sub>1 = bval (Less a1 a2) s\<^sub>2
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  bval (Less a1 a2) s\<^sub>1 = bval (Less a1 a2) s\<^sub>2

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (Bc x) \<Longrightarrow>
       bval (Bc x) s\<^sub>1 = bval (Bc x) s\<^sub>2
 2. \<And>b.
       \<lbrakk>s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b \<Longrightarrow>
                bval b s\<^sub>1 = bval b s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (bexp.Not b)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> bval (bexp.Not b) s\<^sub>1 =
                         bval (bexp.Not b) s\<^sub>2
 3. \<And>b1 b2.
       \<lbrakk>s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b1 \<Longrightarrow>
                bval b1 s\<^sub>1 = bval b1 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars b2 \<Longrightarrow>
        bval b2 s\<^sub>1 = bval b2 s\<^sub>2;
        s\<^sub>1 = s\<^sub>2 on vars (And b1 b2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> bval (And b1 b2) s\<^sub>1 =
                         bval (And b1 b2) s\<^sub>2
qed simp_all

fun lvars :: "com \<Rightarrow> vname set" where
"lvars SKIP = {}" |
"lvars (x::=e) = {x}" |
"lvars (c1;;c2) = lvars c1 \<union> lvars c2" |
"lvars (IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2) = lvars c1 \<union> lvars c2" |
"lvars (WHILE b DO c) = lvars c"

fun rvars :: "com \<Rightarrow> vname set" where
"rvars SKIP = {}" |
"rvars (x::=e) = vars e" |
"rvars (c1;;c2) = rvars c1 \<union> rvars c2" |
"rvars (IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2) = vars b \<union> rvars c1 \<union> rvars c2" |
"rvars (WHILE b DO c) = vars b \<union> rvars c"

instantiation com :: vars
begin
definition "vars_com c = lvars c \<union> rvars c"
instance

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. OFCLASS(com, vars_class)
end

lemma vars_com_simps[simp]:
  "vars SKIP = {}"
  "vars (x::=e) = {x} \<union> vars e"
  "vars (c1;;c2) = vars c1 \<union> vars c2"
  "vars (IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2) = vars b \<union> vars c1 \<union> vars c2"
  "vars (WHILE b DO c) = vars b \<union> vars c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (vars SKIP = {} &&& vars (x ::= e) = {x} \<union> vars e) &&&
    vars (c1;; c2) = vars c1 \<union> vars c2 &&&
    vars (IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2) =
    vars b \<union> vars c1 \<union> vars c2 &&&
    vars (WHILE b DO c) = vars b \<union> vars c
by(auto simp: vars_com_def)
end
